thread.title: REVEALED: Premier League star forced transfer after having secret baby with sexy fan
thread.title_full: REVEALED: Premier League star forced transfer after having secret baby with sexy fan

title: REVEALED: Premier League star forced transfer after having secret baby with sexy fan
text:
GETTY AFFAIR: The top flight footballer requested a transfer after having a baby with a fan 
The player had a fling with the supporter behind the back of his long-term partner and mother of his children. 
He split from his lover – a teacher – following the birth of their baby and asked to switch clubs. 
His bosses did not want him to leave but agreed to a transfer. 
GETTY HEARTBROKEN: His lover thought the pair had a future together 
The Premier League star, who cannot be named for legal reasons, is still with his partner who has forgiven him. “They were a couple who appeared to have a future” Friend of star's lover 
He joined a new club miles away. The teacher called in lawyers to seek child support payments from the player. 
Last night one of her pals told the Daily Star she was “devastated” the footballer appeared not to want any contact with his son. 
“This was no one-night stand. They were a couple who appeared to have a future.” 
GETTY JUST SEX: The player supposedly thought the woman was only motivated by cash 
The teacher said she was considering going public to warn other women about the player’s actions. 
The footballer declined to comment and is seeking an injunction to prevent details of the affair ever being disclosed. 
GETTY TRANSFER: The player's club reluctantly let him leave after the baby was born 
A friend of his told the Daily Star he regretted his relationship with the woman who had offered him “sex on a plate”. 
He believed she was a wannabe WAG who had targeted other players and was motivated by money.
